description.@en: Your skin hardens, rendering you protected from outside forces which could harm you.

criticalFailure.@en: Your skin cracks from weakness and you are wracked with intense pain. You suffer [[/roll 2D10+2]] physical Peril.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but add 9 to your Damage Threshold instead.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, add 6 to your Damage Threshold. In addition, you are immune to Injury and cannot Bleed.

reagents.@en: The skin of a dead strongman
